name: newcastle

a large city in northeast England: I took a train from Newcastle to Stranraer, Scotland. She's a researcher at Newcastle University.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was speaking from his home in Newcastle.When I lived in Durham I used to go shopping in Newcastle.She'll be flying into Newcastle Airport.
